output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(magick)
library(bohemia)

# get bohemia qr function
bohemia::create_qr(id='ABC001')

# read in images
img_tz <- image_read("1.png")
img_mz <- image_read("2.png")


img_inset <- image_scale(img_tz, "30%x") %>% 
  image_border("white", "5x5")

img_with_inset <- img_tz %>% image_composite(
  img_inset,
  operator = "Atop",
  gravity = "SouthWest",
  offset = "-10-10"
)

image_write(img_with_inset, "img_with_inset.png")
```
